channel.title: Community on Data and Open Source
channel.description: Recent content in Community on Data and Open Source

item.title: PostgreSQL Community and you
item.description: I started following the #PGSQLPhriday initiative a couple months back but never had the time to properly sit down and write due to conference traveling. Therefore I was super happy to be at home this week and find out that PGSQL Phriday #003 theme is about the PostgreSQL community!
